column5: First time this year my youngest daughter Maggie has joyned me on the water. Considering beautifull weather, and this special ocasion, I was pumped for this trip  Morning sun   Concentration   Comfort   First catch 5" perch   Second catch 8 " sunfish ( big jump in size )    I was hoping that next will be 12" bass, but instead she has decided to aim higher We were drifting slowly over weedbed. The weeds were very thick, so I've put weedless spoon on her line ( silver minnow) After few minutes she hit a "snag".  , but "snag" is pulling the line I helped her land this "snag"  To top it up she has wanted a nice picture of her catch  , so here it is    After adrenaline rush has ended, we've decided to enjoy this beautifull boating weather   On the end we even left few "doughnuts" on the water  It is history already, but I think I'm still on "cloud nine"
Oh man that must have been quite the rush for her ....  congrats on the great outing ..

right on, I bet she remembers that for a long time.  ya gotta watch them girls, I know, I got 3 daughters, and they can do a good job outfishing the boys sometimes  (well mostly because when I got 3 kids fishing with me, I don't really have time to get my line in there, so they think they got one up on Dad for the day  )  thanks for sharing a great catch

Thats what being a dad is all about !!!!!.  ..well done,and she outfished you too,  thats a day to remember for sure,i will be fishing with my little girl in a few days she is 6yrs old and we are going on holidays and of course going walleye & bass fishing,so it will be fun & memories will be made...cheers,oh ya great musky too,  she must be just thrilled too !!!!!
Excellent report and pics Keram!!!
nice post and great shots.
NICE!!  She's hooked now for sure!
congrats. is that a tiger musky or pike?
wow thats awesome  what a great way to enter the sport!
that's a nice tiger musky!
Fishing with kids is great!!! Thats a sweet tiger!!!
Excellent outing. That's a fine looking tiger musky. What a great catch.

WOW!!! Tell her congrats for me ok?  What a fantastic day on the water Keram...you must be one proud Dad right now!  Hopefully she'll spend more days with you on the water...you know once she's grown, she wont forget those special times you two shared together.  Great job!
That's a nice tiger musky for sure. Where were you fishing? PM me if you don't want all the lurkers to know.
Thats great, my 8 yr old boy out fished me last night with a couple bass, boy did he rub it in!

Mark, You always crack me up Bud, this time you broke my heart! This has to be one of the finest reports I've ever read my friend.  I hope and trust the boat is doing you just service as you an your most perfectly deserve. So happy to hear you got Maggie out with you! WTG,  Mark...nice fish boated tell Maggie..WTG Maggie,. Take Care and be well my friend! -pete
Thanks for the kind words Pete from me and Maggie. As you can see on the pictures the boat doing just fine
Your best report ever, Mark!!  What a beautiful fish....
That's it, I'm selling all my muskie gear...               Sounds like an awesome day on the water!!!!  Congrats!  I am sure she had a great time.
Beautiful fish. Tell her congrats.
Good work Mark, get them hooked early, nothing like having one of your own join you as your fishing partner. Careful she may teach you a thing or two. LOL B
Congrats on your daughter first Muskie! Thanks for sharing.
Thank you all for the kind words. After reading this thread Maggie is in "seven Heaven" We are planning another trip already. She wants to catch "something" bigger
EXCELLENT REPORT!!!!   Congrats to Maggie on her first musky!
